title: The Reason There Is Draft Pick

replies.body:
Draft actually exists so you can do things like pick Lissandra against assassins or ban Malphite if you're running two melee AD.

But in reality, first pick takes katarina and spends the entire game blaming her team.

I first pick Katarina and spend the entire game apologizing for my terrible playing. 

Or I carry. One of the two. Usually the former.
I first pick katarina and spend the whole game juking and laughing at the enemy while my team (hopefully) picks them down so I can penta.

Most people, generally last picks, will claim that they are going to troll if they don't get their lane, but normally are just hoping someone will pity them and take another role, but if that doesn't happen the person will usually just take support, or whatever is left because everyone just wants to win really.

> [{quoted}](name=JoshK69,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rpI1Z7QE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-15T22:44:27.257+0000)

> Most people, generally last picks, will claim that they are going to troll if they don't get their lane, but normally are just hoping someone will pity them and take another role, but if that doesn't happen the person will usually just take support, or whatever is left because everyone just wants to win really.

How do I get teammates like yours then?
Draft pick is the prison island for all of the chat restricted players to congregate.
This. Draft are toxic as fuck now.
Sure they are last pick. but then they proceed to troll pick and force your loss unless a teammate dodges. Draft does nothing to stop trolls.
Yeah but then the mid or feed guy griefs you all game and you get punished for cussing at him while he goes on to say mid or feed again in 5 minutes.  Yay for the system!  :P
no its for toxic people like me hah jokes quitting this game now
its also nice when someone says they want to play tahm kench 3 days after release in ranked. Then you can easily ban him
Or you know, you could not bitch about pick order and settle it like civilized people through compromise and being fair.
After four years of playing league I can honestly say that doesn't work.
